transport.question: I have wheels and go vroom vroom! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you places.
🚦 I need roads to drive on.
⛽ I often need fuel to move.

transport.question: I float on the water, what am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I go in the ocean.
⚓️ I can have a sail.
🐟 Fish swim around me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings, what am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I can travel very far.
💺 People sit inside me.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people, what am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal rails.
📣 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🌍 I can take you to different cities.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me, what am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance on me.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🏞️ You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I carry lots of children to school, what am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am big and yellow.
🛑 I have a stop sign that pops out.
👧 Students ride in me.

transport.question: I help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud siren sound.
🚒 I have a long ladder.
💧 I spray water.

transport.question: I can take you under the sea, what am I?

hints.text: ⚓️ I go deep under water.
🪟 I have round windows called portholes (sometimes!).
🔦 I might be used to explore.

transport.question: I zoom through space, what am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts use me.
🪐 I travel to the moon and planets.

transport.question: I’m a type of transport that flies, but I don't have wings and I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 I can be used in emergencies.
📍 I often land on top of buildings.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and give light to the Earth during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I am hot, hot, hot!
💛 I am a star.
🌎 You need me to grow plants.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, and sometimes you can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change shapes.
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese!
🌎 I am closest to the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that shines very brightly far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🌌 I am much bigger than Earth.
🔥 I make my own light.

cosmos.question: I am where the sun, the moon, and all the stars live. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big.
🚀 You need a rocket to go there.
🌑 Everything is floating inside me.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that appear to form a pattern or picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 There's a big bear one.
💡 People use lines to connect the dots to see the picture
🏹 Some of them are named after animals or heroes.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of rock and metal that goes around the sun. Earth is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 Some are big, some are small.
🚀 You can visit me with a spaceship
🪐 I orbit a star.

cosmos.question: I am the path a planet takes as it goes around the sun. What am I called?

hints.text: 🔁 It goes around and around
🌎 Earth follows one.
📏 It's shaped like a slightly squashed circle.

cosmos.question: I am the name for all the planets, stars, galaxies and everything else in space. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 Everything is part of me.
🔭 Scientists study me with telescopes.
✨ I am very, very, very big.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars, planets, gas and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Our solar system is part of me.
🥛 I look like a milky band in the sky.
🌀 I am spiral-shaped.

cosmos.question: I am a region in space with so much gravity that nothing, not even light, can escape from me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ You can't see me.
🌪️ I suck everything in.
🌌 I'm found in the center of most galaxies
